I think you are right: it should be due to the low light levels => scotopic
vision (option -c in pcond simulate this and it is bundled in the -h
option).
if you want to exclude the -c option, try to use "pcond -a+ -v+ -s+" instead
of "pcond -h+"
cheers,
giulio
